title: Timur Sakharov
text:
Timur Zinurovich Sakharov (; born 19 July 1998) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Yenisey%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk</a> and <a href="FC%20Yenisey-2%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Yenisey-2 Krasnoyarsk</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Yenisey%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk</a> on 5 August 2017 in a game against <a href="FC%20Spartak-2%20Moscow">FC Spartak-2 Moscow</a>.
